description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three\nturns. The user then becomes confused.

name: Sandstorm
description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all\ncombatants except the Rock, Ground, and\nSteel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

name: Giga Drain
description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored\nby half the damage taken by the target.

name: Endure
description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP.\nIts chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: Charm
description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly,\nmaking it less wary. This harshly lowers its\nAttack stat.

name: Rollout
description: The user continually rolls into the target over five\nturns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

name: False Swipe
description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from\nfainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Swagger
description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However,\nthis also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.

name: Milk Drink
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its\nmax HP.

name: Spark
description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the\ntarget. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Fury Cutter
description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This\nattack becomes more powerful if it hits\nin succession.

name: Steel Wing
description: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also\nraise the user’s Defense stat.

name: Mean Look
description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look.\nThe target becomes unable to flee.

name: Attract
description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target\nbecomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

name: Sleep Talk
description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the\nmoves it knows.

name: Heal Bell
description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the\nstatus conditions of all the party Pokémon.

name: Return
description: This full-power attack grows more powerful the\nmore the user likes its Trainer.

name: Present
description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a\nhidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

name: Frustration
description: This full-power attack grows more powerful the\nless the user likes its Trainer.

name: Safeguard
description: The user creates a protective field that prevents\nstatus conditions for five turns.

name: Pain Split
description: The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally\nshares the combined HP with the target.

name: Sacred Fire
description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great\nintensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Magnitude
description: The user attacks everything around it with a\nground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

name: Dynamic Punch
description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated\npower. This confuses the target if it hits.

name: Megahorn
description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams\ninto the target with no letup.

name: Dragon Breath
description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage.\nThis may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Baton Pass
description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in\nwaiting and passes along any stat changes.

name: Encore
description: The user compels the target to keep using the move\nit encored for three turns.

name: Pursuit
description: The power of this attack move is doubled if it’s used\non a target that’s switching out of battle.

name: Rapid Spin
description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as\nBind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

name: Sweet Scent
description: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing\nPokémon’s evasiveness.

name: Iron Tail
description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.\nThis may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Metal Claw
description: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also\nraise the user’s Attack stat.

name: Vital Throw
description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move\nnever misses.

name: Morning Sun
description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP\nregained varies with the weather.

name: Synthesis
description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP\nregained varies with the weather.

name: Moonlight
description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP\nregained varies with the weather.

name: Hidden Power
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Cross Chop
description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms\ncrossed. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Twister
description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the\nopposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

name: Rain Dance
description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five\nturns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers\nthe power of Fire-type moves.

name: Sunny Day
description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering\nup Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of\nWater-type moves.

name: Crunch
description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs.\nThis may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Mirror Coat
description: A retaliation move that counters any special attack,\ninflicting double the damage taken.

name: Psych Up
description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat\nchange made by the target.

name: Extreme Speed
description: The user charges the target at blinding speed.\nThis move always goes first.

name: Ancient Power
description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power.\nThis may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

name: Shadow Ball
description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target.\nThis may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Future Sight
description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic\nenergy attacks the target.

name: Rock Smash
description: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower\nthe target’s Defense stat.

name: Whirlpool
description: The user traps the target in a violent swirling\nwhirlpool for four to five turns.

name: Beat Up
description: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target.\nThe more party Pokémon, the greater the number\nof attacks.

name: Fake Out
description: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch.\nIt only works the first turn the user is in battle.

name: Uproar
description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns.\nDuring that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

name: Stockpile
description: The user charges up power and raises both its\nDefense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used\nthree times.

name: Spit Up
description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is\nreleased at once in an attack. The more power\nis stored, the greater the move’s power.

name: Swallow
description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is\nabsorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more\npower heals more HP.

name: Heat Wave
description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the\nopposing Pokémon. This may also leave those\nPokémon with a burn.

name: Hail
description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.\nIt damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

name: Torment
description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it\nincapable of using the same move twice in a row.

name: Flatter
description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However,\nthis also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Will-O-Wisp
description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the\ntarget to inflict a burn.

name: Memento
description: The user faints when using this move. In return, this\nharshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Facade
description: This attack move doubles its power if the user is\npoisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

name: Focus Punch
description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch.\nThis move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

name: Smelling Salts
description: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a\ntarget with paralysis. This also cures the target’s\nparalysis, however.

name: Follow Me
description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets\ntake aim only at the user.

name: Nature Power
description: This attack makes use of nature’s power. Its\neffects vary depending on the user’s environment.

name: Charge
description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it\nuses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s\nSp. Def stat.

name: Taunt
description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use\nonly attack moves for three turns.

name: Helping Hand
description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of\nthat ally’s attack.

name: Trick
description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its\nheld item with its own.

name: Role Play
description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the\ntarget’s natural Ability.

name: Wish
description: One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its\nreplacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s\nmax HP.

name: Assist
description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among\nthose known by ally Pokémon.

name: Ingrain
description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn.\nBecause it’s rooted, it can’t switch out.

name: Superpower
description: The user attacks the target with great power.\nHowever, this also lowers the user’s Attack and\nDefense stats.

name: Magic Coat
description: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like\nLeech Seed and moves that damage status.

name: Recycle
description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in\nbattle so it can be used again.

name: Revenge
description: This attack move’s power is doubled if the user has\nbeen hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

name: Brick Break
description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break\nbarriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: Yawn
description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target\ninto falling asleep on the next turn.

name: Knock Off
description: The user slaps down the target’s held item, and that\nitem can’t be used in that battle. The move does\nmore damage if the target has a held item.

name: Endeavor
description: This attack move cuts down the target’s HP to equal\nthe user’s HP.

name: Eruption
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive\nfury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the\nmove’s power.

name: Skill Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange\nAbilities with the target.

name: Imprison
description: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by\nthe user, they are prevented from using it.

name: Refresh
description: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn,\nor paralysis.

name: Grudge
description: If the user faints, the user’s grudge fully depletes\nthe PP of the opponent’s move that knocked it out.

name: Snatch
description: The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a\nhealing or stat-changing move.

name: Secret Power
description: The additional effects of this attack depend upon\nwhere it was used.

name: Dive
description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and\nattacks on the next turn.

name: Arm Thrust
description: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm\nthrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

name: Camouflage
description: The user’s type is changed depending on its\nenvironment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in\na cave.

name: Tail Glow
description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind,\ndrastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Luster Purge
description: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This\nmay also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Mist Ball
description: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the\ntarget. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Feather Dance
description: The user covers the target’s body with a mass of\ndown that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

name: Teeter Dance
description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses\nthe Pokémon around it.

name: Blaze Kick
description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit\nmore easily. This may also leave the target with\na burn.

name: Mud Sport
description: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This\nweakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

name: Ice Ball
description: The user attacks the target for five turns.\nThe move’s power increases each time it hits.

name: Needle Arm
description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Slack Off
description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to\nhalf of its max HP.

name: Hyper Voice
description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with\nthe power to inflict damage.

name: Poison Fang
description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may\nalso leave the target badly poisoned.

name: Crush Claw
description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp\nclaws. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Blast Burn
description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user\ncan’t move on the next turn.

name: Hydro Cannon
description: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can’t\nmove on the next turn.

name: Meteor Mash
description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a\nmeteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

name: Astonish
description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a\nstartling fashion. This may also make the\ntarget flinch.

name: Weather Ball
description: This attack move varies in power and type\ndepending on the weather.

name: Aromatherapy
description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all\nstatus conditions affecting the user’s party.

name: Fake Tears
description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly\nlowering its Sp. Def stat.

name: Air Cutter
description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the\nopposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Overheat
description: The user attacks the target at full power. The\nattack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Odor Sleuth
description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal-\nand Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an\nevasive target to be hit.

name: Rock Tomb
description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers\nthe target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.

name: Silver Wind
description: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown\nby the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.

name: Metal Sound
description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers\nthe target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Grass Whistle
description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the\ntarget into a deep sleep.

name: Tickle
description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its\nAttack and Defense stats.

name: Cosmic Power
description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to\nraise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Water Spout
description: The user spouts water to damage opposing\nPokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the\nmove’s power.

name: Signal Beam
description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light.\nThis may also confuse the target.

name: Shadow Punch
description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This\nattack never misses.

name: Extrasensory
description: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown\nskyward with force.

name: Sand Tomb
description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging\nsandstorm for four to five turns.

name: Sheer Cold
description: The target faints instantly. It’s less likely to hit the\ntarget if it’s used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

name: Muddy Water
description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the\nopposing Pokémon. This may also lower\ntheir accuracy.

name: Bullet Seed
description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two\nto five times in a row.

name: Aerial Ace
description: The user confounds the target with speed, then\nslashes. This attack never misses.

name: Icicle Spear
description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to\nfive times in a row.

name: Iron Defense
description: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron,\nsharply raising its Defense stat.

name: Block
description: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread\nwide to prevent escape.

name: Howl
description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises\nits Attack stat.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

name: Frenzy Plant
description: The user slams the target with an enormous tree.\nThe user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Bulk Up
description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body,\nraising both its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Bounce
description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target\non the second turn. This may also leave the target\nwith paralysis.

name: Mud Shot
description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the\ntarget. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Poison Tail
description: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also\npoison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Covet
description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then\nsteals the target’s held item.

name: Volt Tackle
description: The user electrifies itself and charges the target.\nThis also damages the user quite a lot. This attack\nmay leave the target with paralysis.

name: Magical Leaf
description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the\ntarget. This attack never misses.

name: Water Sport
description: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This\nweakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

name: Calm Mind
description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its\nspirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: Leaf Blade
description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and\nattacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land\nmore easily.

name: Dragon Dance
description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful\ndance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

name: Rock Blast
description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five\nrocks are launched in a row.

name: Shock Wave
description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of\nelectricity. This attack never misses.

name: Water Pulse
description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of\nwater. This may also confuse the target.

name: Doom Desire
description: Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated\nbundle of light blasts the target.\n

name: Psycho Boost
description: The user attacks the target at full power. The\nattack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Roost
description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the\nuser’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Gravity
description: Enables Flying-type Pokémon or Pokémon with the\nLevitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves.\nFlying moves can’t be used.

name: Miracle Eye
description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by\nPsychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive\ntarget to be hit.

name: Wake-Up Slap
description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target.\nThis also wakes the target up, however.

name: Hammer Arm
description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist.\nIt lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: Gyro Ball
description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.\nThe slower the user compared to the target, the\ngreater the move’s power.

name: Healing Wish
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its\nplace will have its HP restored and status\nconditions cured.

name: Brine
description: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit\nwith double the power.

name: Natural Gift
description: The user draws power to attack by using its held\nBerry. The Berry determines the move’s type\nand power.

name: Feint
description: This attack hits a target using a move such as\nProtect or Detect.\nThis also lifts the effects of those moves.

name: Pluck
description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a\nBerry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Tailwind
description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups\nthe Speed stat of the user and its allies for\nfour turns.

name: Acupressure
description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply\nboosting one of its or its allies’ stats.

name: Metal Burst
description: The user retaliates with much greater force against\nthe opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

name: U-turn
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to\nswitch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Close Combat
description: The user fights the target up close without guarding\nitself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and\nSp. Def stats.

name: Payback
description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user\nmoves after the target, this attack’s power will\nbe doubled.

name: Assurance
description: If the target has already taken some damage in the\nsame turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

name: Embargo
description: This move prevents the target from using its held\nitem for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from\nusing items on it.

name: Fling
description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack.\nThis move’s power and effects depend on the item.

name: Psycho Shift
description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user\ntransfers its status conditions to the target.

name: Trump Card
description: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.

name: Heal Block
description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team\nfrom using any moves, Abilities, or held items that\nrecover HP.

name: Wring Out
description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP\nthe target has, the greater the move’s power.

name: Power Trick
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its\nAttack stat with its Defense stat.

name: Gastro Acid
description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target.\nThe fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

name: Lucky Chant
description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky,\npreventing opposing Pokémon from landing\ncritical hits for five turns.

name: Me First
description: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use\nthe target’s intended move with greater power.\nThis move fails if it isn’t used first.

name: Copycat
description: The user mimics the move used immediately before\nit. The move fails if no other move has been\nused yet.

name: Power Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch\nchanges to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with\nthe target.

name: Guard Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch\nchanges to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with\nthe target.

name: Punishment
description: The more the target has powered up with stat\nchanges, the greater the move’s power.

name: Last Resort
description: This move can be used only after the user has used\nall the other moves it knows in the battle.

name: Worry Seed
description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target.\nIt prevents sleep by making the target’s\nAbility Insomnia.

name: Sucker Punch
description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move\nfails if the target is not readying an attack.

name: Toxic Spikes
description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of\nthe opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing\nPokémon that switch into battle.

name: Heart Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat\nchanges with the target.

name: Aqua Ring
description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water.\nIt regains some HP every turn.

name: Magnet Rise
description: The user levitates using electrically generated\nmagnetism for five turns.

name: Flare Blitz
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target.\nThis also damages the user quite a lot. This attack\nmay leave the target with a burn.

name: Force Palm
description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may\nalso leave the target with paralysis.

name: Aura Sphere
description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep\nwithin its body at the target. This attack\nnever misses.

name: Rock Polish
description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag.\nThis can sharply raise the Speed stat.

name: Poison Jab
description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped\nin poison. This may also poison the target.

name: Dark Pulse
description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark\nthoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Night Slash
description: The user slashes the target the instant an\nopportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Aqua Tail
description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a\nvicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Seed Bomb
description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds\ndown on the target from above.

name: Air Slash
description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even\nthe sky. This may also make the target flinch.

name: X-Scissor
description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its\nscythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: Bug Buzz
description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by\nvibration. This may also lower the target’s\nSp. Def stat.

name: Dragon Pulse
description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated\nby the user’s gaping mouth.

name: Dragon Rush
description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting\noverwhelming menace. This may also make the\ntarget flinch.

name: Power Gem
description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as\nif it were made of gemstones.

name: Drain Punch
description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored\nby half the damage taken by the target.

name: Vacuum Wave
description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure\nvacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

name: Focus Blast
description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes\nits power. This may also lower the target’s \nSp. Def stat.

name: Energy Ball
description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the\ntarget. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Brave Bird
description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low\naltitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Earth Power
description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt\nwith power. This may also lower the target’s \nSp. Def stat.

name: Switcheroo
description: The user trades held items with the target faster\nthan the eye can follow.

name: Giga Impact
description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its\npower. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Nasty Plot
description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad\nthoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Bullet Punch
description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as\nfast as bullets. This move always goes first.

name: Avalanche
description: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user\nhas been hurt by the target in the same turn.

name: Ice Shard
description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them\nat the target. This move always goes first.

name: Shadow Claw
description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from\nshadows. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Thunder Fang
description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also\nmake the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

name: Ice Fang
description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may\nalso make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

name: Fire Fang
description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may\nalso make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

name: Shadow Sneak
description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target\nfrom behind. This move always goes first.

name: Mud Bomb
description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack.\nThis may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Psycho Cut
description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by\npsychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Zen Headbutt
description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and\nattacks the target. This may also make the\ntarget flinch.

name: Mirror Shot
description: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target\nfrom its polished body. This may also lower the\ntarget’s accuracy.

name: Flash Cannon
description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it\nall at once. This may also lower the target’s\nSp. Def stat.

name: Rock Climb
description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with\nincredible force. This may also confuse the target.

name: Defog
description: A strong wind blows away the target’s barriers such\nas Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the\ntarget’s evasiveness.

name: Trick Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower\nPokémon get to move first for five turns.

name: Draco Meteor
description: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the\ntarget. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Discharge
description: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose\na flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

name: Lava Plume
description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno\nof scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits\nwith a burn.

name: Leaf Storm
description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the\ntarget. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Power Whip
description: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the \nlike to harshly lash the target.

name: Rock Wrecker
description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to\nattack. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Cross Poison
description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may\nalso poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Gunk Shot
description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to\nattack. This may also poison the target.

name: Iron Head
description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Magnet Bomb
description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the\ntarget. This attack never misses.

name: Stone Edge
description: The user stabs the target from below with\nsharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Captivate
description: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of\nthe user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Stealth Rock
description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the\nopposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon\nthat switch into battle.

name: Grass Knot
description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it.\nThe heavier the target, the greater the\nmove’s power.

name: Chatter
description: The user attacks the target with sound waves of\ndeafening chatter. This confuses the target.

name: Judgment
description: The user releases countless shots of light at the\ntarget. This move’s type varies depending on the\nkind of Plate the user is holding.

name: Bug Bite
description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a\nBerry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: Charge Beam
description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user\nmay use any remaining electricity to raise its\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Wood Hammer
description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to\nattack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Aqua Jet
description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes\nit almost invisible. This move always goes first.

name: Attack Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the\ntarget. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Defend Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body,\nraising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Heal Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user\nregains up to half of its max HP.

name: Head Smash
description: The user attacks the target with a hazardous,\nfull-power headbutt. This also damages the\nuser terribly.

name: Double Hit
description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a\ntentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Roar of Time
description: The user blasts the target with power that distorts\neven time. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Spacial Rend
description: The user tears the target along with the space\naround it. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Lunar Dance
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its\nplace will have its status and HP fully restored.

name: Crush Grip
description: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP\nthe target has left, the greater this move’s power.

name: Magma Storm
description: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of\nfire that rages for four to five turns.

name: Dark Void
description: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total\ndarkness that makes them sleep.

name: Seed Flare
description: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack\nits target. This may also harshly lower the target’s\nSp. Def stat.

name: Ominous Wind
description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive\nwind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

name: Shadow Force
description: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the\nnext turn. This move hits even if the target\nprotects itself.

name: Hone Claws
description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat\nand accuracy.

name: Wide Guard
description: The user and its allies are protected from\nwide-ranging attacks for one turn.

name: Guard Split
description: The user employs its psychic power to average its\nDefense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

name: Power Split
description: The user employs its psychic power to average its\nAttack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

name: Wonder Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s\nDefense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for\nfive turns.

name: Psyshock
description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack\nthe target. This attack does physical damage.

name: Venoshock
description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous\nliquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target\nis poisoned.

name: Autotomize
description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter\nand sharply raise its Speed stat.

name: Rage Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to\ndraw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at\nthe user.

name: Telekinesis
description: The user makes the target float with its psychic\npower. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

name: Magic Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s\nheld items lose their effects for five turns.

name: Smack Down
description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to\nattack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the\nground when it’s hit.

name: Storm Throw
description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This\nattack always results in a critical hit.

name: Flame Burst
description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame.\nThe bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the\ntarget as well.

name: Sludge Wave
description: The user strikes everything around it by swamping\nthe area with a giant sludge wave. This may also\npoison those hit.

name: Quiver Dance
description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance.\nThis boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and\nSpeed stats.

name: Heavy Slam
description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body.\nThe more the user outweighs the target, the greater\nthe move’s power.

name: Synchronoise
description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage\non any Pokémon of the same type in the area\naround it.

name: Electro Ball
description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The\nfaster the user is than the target, the greater the\nmove’s power.

name: Soak
description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and\nchanges the target’s type to Water.

name: Flame Charge
description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,\nbuilding up more power, the user raises its\nSpeed stat.

name: Coil
description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its\nAttack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

name: Low Sweep
description: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs,\nwhich lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Acid Spray
description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target.\nThis harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Foul Play
description: The user turns the target’s power against it. The\nhigher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the\nmove’s power.

name: Simple Beam
description: The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the\ntarget’s Ability to Simple.

name: Entrainment
description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels\nthe target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability\nthe same as the user’s.

name: After You
description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move\nright after the user.

name: Round
description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can\njoin in the Round to increase the power of\nthe attack.

name: Echoed Voice
description: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice.\nIf this move is used every turn, its power\nis increased.

name: Chip Away
description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently.\nThe target’s stat changes don’t affect this\nattack’s damage.

name: Clear Smog
description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special\nmud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

name: Stored Power
description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The\nmore the user’s stats are raised, the greater the\nmove’s power.

name: Quick Guard
description: The user protects itself and its allies from\npriority moves.

name: Ally Switch
description: The user teleports using a strange power and\nswitches places with one of its allies.

name: Scald
description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target.\nThis may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Shell Smash
description: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and\nSp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk,\nand Speed stats.

name: Heal Pulse
description: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the\ntarget’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Hex
description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a\ntarget affected by status conditions.

name: Sky Drop
description: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it\nduring the next turn. The target cannot attack while\nin the sky.

name: Shift Gear
description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and\nsharply raising its Speed stat.

name: Circle Throw
description: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is\ndragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against\na single Pokémon.

name: Incinerate
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.\nIf a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a\nBerry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

name: Quash
description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move\ngo last.

name: Acrobatics
description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not\nholding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

name: Reflect Type
description: The user reflects the target’s type, making it the\nsame type as the target.

name: Retaliate
description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally\nfainted in the previous turn, this move’s power\nis increased.

name: Final Gambit
description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The\nuser faints but does damage equal to its HP.

name: Bestow
description: The user passes its held item to the target when the\ntarget isn’t holding an item.

name: Inferno
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an\nintense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

name: Water Pledge
description: A column of water strikes the target. When combined\nwith its fire equivalent, its power increases and a\nrainbow appears.

name: Fire Pledge
description: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its\ngrass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea\nof fire appears.

name: Grass Pledge
description: A column of grass hits the target. When used with\nits water equivalent, its power increases and a vast\nswamp appears.

name: Volt Switch
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to\nswitch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Struggle Bug
description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing\nPokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

name: Bulldoze
description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping\ndown on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of\nthose hit.

name: Frost Breath
description: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This\nattack always results in a critical hit.

name: Dragon Tail
description: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon\nis dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against\na single Pokémon.

name: Work Up
description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk\nstats increase.

name: Electroweb
description: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon\nusing an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.

name: Wild Charge
description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes\ninto its target. This also damages the user a little.

name: Drill Run
description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its\nbody like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

name: Dual Chop
description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal\nstrikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: Heart Stamp
description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act\nmakes the target less wary. This may also make the\ntarget flinch.

name: Horn Leech
description: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns.\nThe user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken\nby the target.

name: Sacred Sword
description: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The\ntarget’s stat changes don’t affect this\nattack’s damage.

name: Razor Shell
description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may\nalso lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: Heat Crash
description: The user slams its target with its flame-covered\nbody. The more the user outweighs the target, the\ngreater the move’s power.

name: Leaf Tornado
description: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp\nleaves. This attack may also lower the\ntarget’s accuracy.

name: Steamroller
description: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target\nwith its rolled-up body. This may also make the\ntarget flinch.

name: Cotton Guard
description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft\ncotton, which drastically raises the user’s\nDefense stat.

name: Night Daze
description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its\ntarget. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Psystrike
description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack\nthe target. This attack does physical damage.

name: Tail Slap
description: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard\ntail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

name: Hurricane
description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a\nfierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also\nconfuse the target.

name: Head Charge
description: The user charges its head into its target, using its\npowerful guard hair. This also damages the user\na little.

name: Gear Grind
description: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its\ntarget twice.

name: Searing Shot
description: The user torches everything around it in an inferno\nof scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits\nwith a burn.

name: Techno Blast
description: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The\nmove’s type changes depending on the Drive the\nuser holds.

name: Relic Song
description: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by\nappealing to the hearts of the listening opposing\nPokémon. This may also induce sleep.

name: Secret Sword
description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power\ncontained in the horn does physical damage to\nthe target.

name: Glaciate
description: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at\nopposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.

name: Bolt Strike
description: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of\nelectricity and charges its target. This may also\nleave the target with paralysis.

name: Blue Flare
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an\nintense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave\nthe target with a burn.

name: Fiery Dance
description: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its\nwings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Freeze Shock
description: On the second turn, the user hits the target with\nelectrically charged ice. This may also leave the\ntarget with paralysis.

name: Ice Burn
description: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind\nsurrounds the target. This may leave the target with\na burn.

name: Snarl
description: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something,\nwhich lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.

name: Icicle Crash
description: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles\nonto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

name: V-create
description: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself\nat its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def,\nand Speed stats.

name: Fusion Flare
description: The user brings down a giant flame. This move’s\npower is increased when influenced by an enormous\nlightning bolt.

name: Fusion Bolt
description: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This\nmove’s power is increased when influenced by an\nenormous flame.

name: Flying Press
description: The user dives down onto the target from the sky.\nThis move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

name: Mat Block
description: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects\nitself and its allies from damaging moves. This does\nnot stop status moves.

name: Belch
description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target.\nThe user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

name: Rototiller
description: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to\ngrow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of\nGrass-type Pokémon.

name: Sticky Web
description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing\nteam, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching\ninto battle.

name: Fell Stinger
description: When the user knocks out a target with this move,\nthe user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

name: Phantom Force
description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the\ntarget on the next turn. This move hits even if the\ntarget protects itself.

name: Trick-or-Treat
description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating.\nThis adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

name: Noble Roar
description: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the\ntarget and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Ion Deluge
description: The user disperses electrically charged particles,\nwhich changes Normal-type moves to\nElectric-type moves.

name: Parabolic Charge
description: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP\nis restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

name: Forest’s Curse
description: The user puts a forest curse on the target.\nThe target is now Grass type as well.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks\neverything around it.

name: Freeze-Dry
description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also\nleave the target frozen. This move is super effective\non Water types.

name: Disarming Voice
description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional\ndamage to opposing Pokémon. This attack\nnever misses.

name: Parting Shot
description: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s\nAttack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a\nparty Pokémon.

name: Topsy-Turvy
description: All stat changes affecting the target turn\ntopsy-turvy and become the opposite of what\nthey were.

name: Draining Kiss
description: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The\nuser’s HP is restored by over half of the damage\ntaken by the target.

name: Crafty Shield
description: The user protects itself and its allies from status\nmoves with a mysterious power. This does not stop\nmoves that do damage.

name: Flower Shield
description: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type\nPokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

name: Grassy Terrain
description: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns.\nThis restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a\nlittle every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.

name: Misty Terrain
description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status\nconditions and halves damage from Dragon-type\nmoves for five turns.

name: Electrify
description: If the target is electrified before it uses a move\nduring that turn, the target’s move becomes\nElectric type.

name: Play Rough
description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it.\nThis may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: Fairy Wind
description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target\nwith it.

name: Moonblast
description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks\nthe target. This may also lower the target’s\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Boomburst
description: The user attacks everything around it with the\ndestructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

name: Fairy Lock
description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all\nPokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

name: King’s Shield
description: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects\nitself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack\nstat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

name: Play Nice
description: The user and the target become friends, and the\ntarget loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s\nAttack stat.

name: Confide
description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target\nloses its ability to concentrate. This lowers\nthe target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Diamond Storm
description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage\nopposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the\nuser’s Defense stat.

name: Steam Eruption
description: The user immerses the target in superheated steam.\nThis may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Hyperspace Hole
description: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right\nnext to the target and strikes. This also hits a target\nusing a move such as Protect or Detect.

name: Water Shuriken
description: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to\nfive times in a row. This move always goes first.

name: Mystical Fire
description: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire.\nThis also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Spiky Shield
description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this\nmove also damages any attacker who makes\ndirect contact.

name: Aromatic Mist
description: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon\nby using a mysterious aroma.

name: Eerie Impulse
description: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse.\nExposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Venom Drench
description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd\npoisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and\nSpeed stats of a poisoned target.

name: Powder
description: The user covers the target in a combustible powder.\nIf the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder\nexplodes and damages the target.

name: Geomancy
description: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its\nSp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

name: Magnetic Flux
description: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises\nthe Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with\nthe Plus or Minus Ability.

name: Happy Hour
description: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize\nmoney received after battle.

name: Electric Terrain
description: The user electrifies the ground for five turns,\npowering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the\nground no longer fall asleep.

name: Dazzling Gleam
description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a\npowerful flash.

name: Celebrate
description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

name: Hold Hands
description: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them\nvery happy.

name: Baby-Doll Eyes
description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll\neyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always\ngoes first.

name: Nuzzle
description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks\nagainst the target. This also leaves the target\nwith paralysis.

name: Hold Back
description: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target\nis left with at least 1 HP.

name: Infestation
description: The target is infested and attacked for four to five\nturns. The target can’t flee during this time.

name: Power-Up Punch
description: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s\nfists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

name: Oblivion Wing
description: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is\nrestored by over half of the damage taken by\nthe target.

name: Thousand Arrows
description: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in\nthe air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to\nthe ground.

name: Thousand Waves
description: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the\nground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.

name: Land’s Wrath
description: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses\nthat power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

name: Light of Ruin
description: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user\nfires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the\nuser quite a lot.

name: Origin Pulse
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless\nbeams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

name: Precipice Blades
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting\nthe power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

name: Dragon Ascent
description: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by\ndropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers\nits own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.

name: Hyperspace Fury
description: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of\nattacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect\nand Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.

name: Breakneck Blitz
description: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power\nand crashes into the target at full speed. The power\nvaries, depending on the original move.

name: Breakneck Blitz
description: Dummy Data

name: All-Out Pummeling
description: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power\ninto the target with full force. The power varies,\ndepending on the original move.

name: All-Out Pummeling
description: Dummy Data

name: Supersonic Skystrike
description: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets\ntoward the target at full speed. The power varies,\ndepending on the original move.

name: Supersonic Skystrike
description: Dummy Data

name: Acid Downpour
description: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its\nZ-Power and sinks the target into it at full force.\nThe power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Acid Downpour
description: Dummy Data

name: Tectonic Rage
description: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams\ninto the target with the full force of its Z-Power.\nThe power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Tectonic Rage
description: Dummy Data

name: Continental Crush
description: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its\nZ-Power and drops it onto the target with full force.\nThe power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Continental Crush
description: Dummy Data

name: Savage Spin-Out
description: The user binds the target with full force with\nthreads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power.\nThe power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Savage Spin-Out
description: Dummy Data

name: Never-Ending Nightmare
description: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s\nZ-Power trap the target. The power varies,\ndepending on the original move.

name: Never-Ending Nightmare
description: Dummy Data

name: Corkscrew Crash
description: The user spins very fast and rams into the target\nwith the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies,\ndepending on the original move.

name: Corkscrew Crash
description: Dummy Data

name: Inferno Overdrive
description: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward\nthe target with the full force of its Z-Power.\nThe power varies depending on the original move.

name: Inferno Overdrive
description: Dummy Data

name: Hydro Vortex
description: The user creates a huge whirling current using\nits Z-Power to swallow the target with full force.\nThe power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Hydro Vortex
description: Dummy Data

name: Bloom Doom
description: The user collects energy from plants using its\nZ-Power and attacks the target with full force.\nThe power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Bloom Doom
description: Dummy Data

name: Gigavolt Havoc
description: The user hits the target with a powerful electric\ncurrent collected by its Z-Power. The power varies,\ndepending on the original move.

name: Gigavolt Havoc
description: Dummy Data

name: Shattered Psyche
description: The user controls the target with its Z-Power and\nhurts the target with full force. The power varies,\ndepending on the original move.

name: Shattered Psyche
description: Dummy Data

name: Subzero Slammer
description: The user dramatically drops the temperature using\nits Z-Power and freezes the target with full force.\nThe power varies, depending on the original move.

name: Subzero Slammer
description: Dummy Data

name: Devastating Drake
description: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and\nattacks the target with full force. The power varies,\ndepending on the original move.

name: Devastating Drake
description: Dummy Data

name: Black Hole Eclipse
description: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power\nand sucks the target into it. The power varies,\ndepending on the original move.

name: Black Hole Eclipse
description: Dummy Data

name: Twinkle Tackle
description: The user creates a very charming space using its\nZ-Power and totally toys with the target. The power\nvaries, depending on the original move.

name: Twinkle Tackle
description: Dummy Data

name: Catastropika
description: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the\nmaximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power\nand pounces on its target with full force.

name: Shore Up
description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores\nmore HP in a sandstorm.

name: First Impression
description: Although this move has great power, it only works\nthe first turn the user is in battle.

name: Baneful Bunker
description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this\nmove also poisons any attacker that makes\ndirect contact.

name: Spirit Shackle
description: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the\ntarget’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target\nfrom escaping.

name: Darkest Lariat
description: The user swings both arms and hits the target.\nThe target’s stat changes don’t affect this\nattack’s damage.

name: Sparkling Aria
description: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.\nAny Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed\nby the touch of these bubbles.

name: Ice Hammer
description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist.\nIt lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: Floral Healing
description: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its\nmax HP. It restores more HP when the terrain\nis grass.

name: High Horsepower
description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its\nentire body.

name: Strength Sap
description: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the\ntarget’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s\nAttack stat.

name: Solar Blade
description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and\nfills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the\ntarget on the next turn.

name: Leafage
description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

name: Spotlight
description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that\nonly the target will be attacked during the turn.

name: Toxic Thread
description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the\ntarget and lower the target’s Speed stat.

name: Laser Focus
description: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the\nnext turn always results in a critical hit.

name: Gear Up
description: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and\nSp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or\nMinus Ability.

name: Throat Chop
description: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the\nresultant suffering prevents the target from using\nmoves that emit sound for two turns.

name: Pollen Puff
description: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that\nexplodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a\npollen puff that restores its HP instead.

name: Anchor Shot
description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain\nwhile attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: Psychic Terrain
description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority\nmoves and powers up Psychic-type moves for\nfive turns.

name: Lunge
description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with\nfull force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Fire Lash
description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This\nalso lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: Power Trip
description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target.\nThe more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the\nmove’s power.

name: Burn Up
description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out.\nAfter using this move, the user will no longer be\nFire type.

name: Speed Swap
description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: Smart Strike
description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This\nattack never misses.

name: Purify
description: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the\nmove succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

name: Revelation Dance
description: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard.\nThe user’s type determines the type of this move.

name: Core Enforcer
description: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on\nhave already used their moves, this move eliminates\nthe effect of the target’s Ability.

name: Trop Kick
description: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on\nthe target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Instruct
description: The user instructs the target to use the target’s last\nmove again.

name: Beak Blast
description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks\nthe target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon\nwhile it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.

name: Clanging Scales
description: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and\nmakes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon.\nThe user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.

name: Dragon Hammer
description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the\ntarget and inflict damage.

name: Brutal Swing
description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict\ndamage on everything in its vicinity.

name: Aurora Veil
description: This move reduces damage from physical and\nspecial moves for five turns. This can be used only\nin a hailstorm.

name: Sinister Arrow Raid
description: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows\nusing its Z-Power and shoots the target with\nfull force.

name: Malicious Moonsault
description: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using\nits Z-Power and crashes into the target with\nfull force.

name: Oceanic Operetta
description: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of \nwater using its Z-Power and attacks the target with \nfull force.

name: Guardian of Alola
description: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s\nenergy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with\nfull force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.

name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow,\npunches and kicks the target consecutively\nwith full force.

name: Stoked Sparksurfer
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu,\nattacks the target with full force. This move leaves\nthe target with paralysis.

name: Pulverizing Pancake
description: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user,\nSnorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body\nenergetically and attacks the target with full force.

name: Extreme Evoboost
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets\nenergy from its evolved friends and boosts its\nstats sharply.

name: Genesis Supernova
description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks\nthe target with full force. The terrain will be charged\nwith psychic energy.

name: Shell Trap
description: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a\nphysical move, the trap will explode and inflict\ndamage on the opposing Pokémon.

name: Fleur Cannon
description: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s\nrecoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Psychic Fangs
description: The user bites the target with its psychic\ncapabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen\nand Reflect.

name: Stomping Tantrum
description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If\nthe user’s previous move has failed, the power of\nthis move doubles.

name: Shadow Bone
description: The user attacks by beating the target with a\nbone that contains a spirit. This may also lower\nthe target’s Defense stat.

name: Accelerock
description: The user smashes into the target at high speed.\nThis move always goes first.

name: Liquidation
description: The user slams into the target using a full-force\nblast of water. This may also lower the target’s\nDefense stat.

name: Prismatic Laser
description: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of\na prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Spectral Thief
description: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals\nthe target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

name: Sunsteel Strike
description: The user slams into the target with the force of a\nmeteor. This move can be used on the target \nregardless of its Abilities.

name: Moongeist Beam
description: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target.\nThis move can be used on the target regardless of \nits Abilities.

name: Tearful Look
description: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose\nits combative spirit. This lowers the target’s\nAttack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Zing Zap
description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target,\ngiving it an electric shock. This may also make the\ntarget flinch.

name: Nature’s Madness
description: The user hits the target with the force of nature.\nIt halves the target’s HP.

name: Multi-Attack
description: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the\ntarget. The memory held determines the move’s type.

name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
description: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of\nelectricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Hidden Power (Fighting)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Flying)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Poison)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Ground)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Rock)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Bug)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Ghost)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Steel)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Fire)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Water)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Grass)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Electric)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Psychic)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Ice)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Dragon)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Hidden Power (Dark)
description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the\nPokémon using it.

name: Écras’Face
description: Écrase l’ennemi avec les pattes avant ou la queue,\npar exemple.

name: Poing-Karaté
description: L’ennemi est tranché violemment.\nTaux de critique élevé.

name: Torgnoles
description: Gifle rapidement l’ennemi de deux à cinq fois\nd’affilée.

name: Poing Comète
description: Une tornade de coups de poing qui frappe de\ndeux à cinq fois d’affilée.

name: Ultimapoing
description: L’ennemi reçoit un coup de poing d’une puissance\nincroyable.

name: Jackpot
description: Des pièces sont lancées sur l’ennemi.\nPermet d’obtenir de l’argent à la fin du combat.

name: Poing de Feu
description: Un coup de poing enflammé vient frapper l’ennemi.\nPeut le brûler.

name: Poing-Glace
description: Un coup de poing glacé vient frapper l’ennemi.\nPeut le geler.

name: Poing-Éclair
description: Un coup de poing électrique vient frapper l’ennemi.\nPeut le paralyser.

name: Griffe
description: Lacère l’ennemi avec des griffes acérées pour lui\ninfliger des dégâts.

name: Force Poigne
description: L’ennemi est attrapé et compressé par les côtés.

name: Guillotine
description: Des pinces lacèrent violemment l’ennemi, le mettant\nK.O. sur le coup s’il est touché.

name: Coupe-Vent
description: Attaque en deux tours.\nDes lames de vent frappent l’ennemi au second\ntour. Taux de critique élevé.

name: Danse-Lames
description: Danse frénétique qui exalte l’esprit combatif.\nAugmente beaucoup l’Attaque du lanceur.

name: Coupe
description: Coupe l’ennemi avec des lames ou des griffes.

name: Tornade
description: Le lanceur bat des ailes pour générer une\nbourrasque qui blesse l’ennemi.

name: Cru-Aile
description: L’ennemi est frappé par de larges ailes déployées\npour infliger des dégâts.

name: Cyclone
description: Éjecte le Pokémon ennemi et le remplace par\nun autre. Lors d’un combat contre un Pokémon\nsauvage seul, met fin au combat.

name: Vol
description: Le lanceur s’envole au premier tour et frappe au\nsecond.

name: Étreinte
description: Ligote l’ennemi avec les tentacules ou le corps\npour l’écraser durant quatre à cinq tours.

name: Souplesse
description: Fouette l’ennemi avec la queue ou une liane,\npar exemple, pour infliger des dégâts.

name: Fouet Lianes
description: Fouette l’ennemi avec de fines lianes pour infliger\ndes dégâts.

name: Écrasement
description: Écrase l’ennemi avec un énorme pied.\nPeut aussi l’apeurer.

name: Double Pied
description: Deux coups de pied qui frappent l’ennemi deux\nfois d’affilée.

name: Ultimawashi
description: Un coup de pied surpuissant qui frappe l’ennemi.

name: Pied Sauté
description: Le lanceur s’envole pour décocher un coup de\npied sauté. S’il échoue, le lanceur se blesse.

name: Mawashi Geri
description: Le lanceur effectue un coup de pied tournoyant\net extrêmement rapide. Peut apeurer l’ennemi.

name: Jet de Sable
description: Lance du sable au visage de l’ennemi pour baisser\nsa Précision.

name: Coup d’Boule
description: Le lanceur donne un coup de tête.\nPeut apeurer l’ennemi.

name: Koud’Korne
description: Frappe l’ennemi d’un coup de corne pointue pour\ninfliger des dégâts.

name: Furie
description: Frappe l’ennemi deux à cinq fois d’affilée avec\nun bec ou une corne, par exemple.

name: Empal’Korne
description: Un coup de corne en vrille qui empale l’ennemi,\nle mettant K.O. sur le coup s’il est touché.

name: Charge
description: Le lanceur charge l’ennemi et le percute de tout\nson poids.

name: Plaquage
description: Le lanceur se laisse tomber sur l’ennemi de tout\nson poids. Peut aussi le paralyser.

name: Ligotage
description: Le lanceur ligote l’ennemi avec des lianes ou son\ncorps pour l’écraser durant quatre à cinq tours.

name: Bélier
description: Une charge violente qui blesse aussi légèrement\nle lanceur.

name: Mania
description: Une attaque furieuse qui dure de deux à trois tours.\nLe lanceur devient confus.

name: Damoclès
description: Une charge dangereuse et imprudente.\nBlesse aussi gravement le lanceur.

name: Mimi-Queue
description: Le lanceur remue son adorable queue pour\ntromper la vigilance de l’ennemi et baisser\nsa Défense.

name: Dard-Venin
description: Un dard toxique qui transperce l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi l’empoisonner.

name: Double-Dard
description: Un double coup de dard qui transperce l’ennemi\ndeux fois d’affilée. Peut aussi l’empoisonner.

name: Dard-Nuée
description: Envoie une rafale de dards.\nPeut toucher de deux à cinq fois.

name: Groz’Yeux
description: Le lanceur fait les gros yeux à l’ennemi pour\nl’intimider et baisser sa Défense.

name: Morsure
description: L’ennemi est mordu par de tranchantes canines.\nPeut l’apeurer.

name: Rugissement
description: Le lanceur pousse un cri tout mimi pour tromper\nla vigilance de l’ennemi et baisser son Attaque.

name: Hurlement
description: Effraie le Pokémon ennemi et le remplace par\nun autre. Lors d’un combat contre un Pokémon\nsauvage seul, met fin au combat.

name: Berceuse
description: Une berceuse plonge l’ennemi dans un profond\nsommeil.

name: Ultrason
description: Le lanceur produit d’étranges ondes sonores qui\nrendent la cible confuse.

name: Sonicboom
description: Une onde de choc destructrice qui inflige toujours\n20 PV de dégâts.

name: Entrave
description: Empêche l’ennemi d’employer à nouveau\nsa dernière attaque. Dure quatre tours.

name: Acide
description: Le lanceur attaque l’ennemi avec un jet d’acide\ncorrosif. Peut aussi baisser sa Défense Spéciale.

name: Flammèche
description: L’ennemi est attaqué par une faible flamme.\nPeut aussi le brûler.

name: Lance-Flammes
description: L’ennemi reçoit un torrent de flammes.\nPeut aussi le brûler.

name: Brume
description: Une brume blanche enveloppe l’équipe du lanceur\net empêche la réduction des stats pour cinq tours.

name: Pistolet à O
description: De l’eau est projetée avec force sur l’ennemi.

name: Hydrocanon
description: Un puissant jet d’eau est dirigé sur l’ennemi.

name: Surf
description: Une énorme vague s’abat sur le champ de bataille\net inflige des dégâts à tous les Pokémon autour\ndu lanceur.

name: Laser Glace
description: Un rayon de glace frappe l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le geler.

name: Blizzard
description: Une violente tempête de neige s’abat sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le geler.

name: Rafale Psy
description: Un étrange rayon frappe l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le rendre confus.

name: Bulles d’O
description: Des bulles sont envoyées avec puissance\nsur l’ennemi. Peut aussi baisser sa Vitesse.

name: Onde Boréale
description: Envoie un rayon arc-en-ciel sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi baisser son Attaque.

name: Ultralaser
description: Projette un puissant rayon sur l’ennemi.\nLe lanceur doit se reposer au tour suivant.

name: Picpic
description: Frappe l’ennemi d’un bec pointu ou d’une corne\npour infliger des dégâts.

name: Bec Vrille
description: Une attaque utilisant le bec comme une perceuse.

name: Sacrifice
description: Le lanceur agrippe l’ennemi et l’écrase au sol.\nBlesse aussi légèrement le lanceur.

name: Balayage
description: Un puissant coup de pied bas qui fauche l’ennemi.\nIl est plus efficace contre les ennemis lourds.

name: Riposte
description: Une riposte qui répond à toute capacité physique\nen infligeant le double de dégâts.

name: Frappe Atlas
description: L’ennemi est projeté grâce au pouvoir de la gravité.\nInflige des dégâts équivalents au niveau du lanceur.

name: Force
description: Le lanceur cogne l’ennemi de toutes ses forces.

name: Vol-Vie
description: Une attaque qui convertit la moitié des dégâts\ninfligés en PV pour le lanceur.

name: Méga-Sangsue
description: Une attaque qui convertit la moitié des dégâts\ninfligés en PV pour le lanceur.

name: Vampigraine
description: Une graine est semée sur l’ennemi.\nÀ chaque tour, elle lui dérobe des PV que le lanceur\nrécupère.

name: Croissance
description: Le corps du lanceur se développe.\nAugmente l’Attaque et l’Attaque Spéciale.

name: Tranch’Herbe
description: Des feuilles aiguisées comme des rasoirs entaillent\nl’ennemi. Taux de critique élevé.

name: Lance-Soleil
description: Absorbe la lumière au premier tour et envoie\nun rayon puissant au tour suivant.

name: Poudre Toxik
description: Une poudre toxique empoisonne l’ennemi.

name: Para-Spore
description: Le lanceur répand sur l’ennemi une poudre qui\nle paralyse.

name: Poudre Dodo
description: Le lanceur répand une poudre soporifique qui\nendort la cible.

name: Danse-Fleur
description: Le lanceur attaque en projetant des pétales\npendant deux à trois tours avant de céder à\nla confusion.

name: Sécrétion
description: Le lanceur crache de la soie pour ligoter l’ennemi\net beaucoup baisser sa Vitesse.

name: Draco-Rage
description: La colère du lanceur déclenche une onde de choc\ndestructrice qui inflige toujours 40 PV de dégâts.

name: Danse Flamme
description: Un tourbillon de flammes emprisonne l’ennemi\npendant quatre à cinq tours.

name: Éclair
description: Une décharge électrique tombe sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le paralyser.

name: Tonnerre
description: Une grosse décharge électrique tombe sur\nl’ennemi. Peut aussi le paralyser.

name: Cage-Éclair
description: Un faible choc électrique frappe l’ennemi.\nSi l’attaque le touche, celui-ci est paralysé.

name: Fatal-Foudre
description: La foudre tombe sur l’ennemi pour lui infliger\ndes dégâts. Peut aussi le paralyser.

name: Jet-Pierres
description: Le lanceur lâche une pierre sur l’ennemi.

name: Séisme
description: Le lanceur provoque un tremblement de terre\ntouchant tous les Pokémon autour de lui.

name: Abîme
description: Le lanceur fait tomber l’ennemi dans une crevasse.\nSi cette attaque réussit, elle met K.O. sur le coup.

name: Tunnel
description: Le lanceur creuse au premier tour et frappe au\nsecond.

name: Toxik
